DOC.criteria: 1 . FEMALE SUBJECT BETWEEN 18 AND 75 YEARS OF AGE . 2 . ABILITY TO PROVIDE INFORMED CONSENT 1 . SUBJECT WITH KNOWN PREGNANCY AT TIME OF SCREENING . 2 . PREVIOUS HISTORY OF HYSTERECTOMY 3 . PARTICIPATION IN ANOTHER CLINICAL TRIAL WITHIN LAST 30 DAYS .
